body_html: Thanks @yilei. Though I don't think we can raise the same exception type, I think it's fine in the short term to raise a ValueError for now that will then change to ValidationError when we switch. Please document that the exception raised will change in the future so it's documented as not being part of the official API. Thanks!
body_text: Thanks @yilei.  Though I don't think we can raise the same exception type, I think it's fine in the short term to raise a ValueError for now that will then change to ValidationError when we switch.   Please document that the exception raised will change in the future so it's documented as not being part of the official API.  Thanks!
body: Thanks @yilei.  Though I don't think we can raise the same exception type, I think it's fine in the short term to raise a ValueError for now that will then change to ValidationError when we switch.   Please document that the exception raised will change in the future so it's documented as not being part of the official API.  Thanks!
